message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your life. I am offering it to you for $200. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
Hi Alice,  Thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the product's potential, $200 is above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $100 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To better accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. This price reflects the value I believe it holds for you, while remaining within your budget. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $100.  This is my absolute limit, so let me know if you're willing to come down to that price.

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to meet you halfway at $125. This price reflects the cost of production and distribution, while also allowing you to acquire a high-quality product at a reasonable price. I hope this proposal aligns more closely with your budget and we can finalize the transaction.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still not there yet.  $125 is still over my budget.  Let's meet in the middle at $112.50.  This is a fair price for both of us.
